title: AIGen Studio — Single-page landing (mock generate + static gallery)

requirements.summary: Implement a responsive single-page landing layout matching the uploaded design (nav, hero, prompt/generate, gallery).
acceptanceCriteria: Page structure matches the uploaded design at a high level (nav + hero + prompt/generate section + gallery).
Typography, spacing, and overall look-and-feel are visually consistent with the uploaded design (dark cinematic card, subtle glow, elegant headline).
Layout is responsive (mobile/tablet/desktop) with no horizontal overflow.

file_operations.description: Create the single-page layout (Nav, Hero, Prompt/Generate, Gallery, plus lower sections from other requirements) using responsive Tailwind classes and section anchors to closely replicate grok_image_xg2a6g3.jpg styling; ensure no horizontal overflow and match the dark cinematic card/glow composition.
Ensure document metadata supports the single-page landing experience (title already set) and prepare for any font loading strategy used by the theme (keep user-facing text in English).
Confirm App is mounted as a single-page experience and preserve existing providers while ensuring the new landing renders correctly.

requirements.summary: Build top navigation with Home/Gallery/Pricing/Contact links and smooth-scroll to sections with responsive behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking Home/Gallery/Pricing/Contact scrolls to the correct section.
Active/hover states are styled coherently with the overall theme.
On small screens, navigation remains usable (e.g., collapses into a menu or wraps cleanly).

file_operations.description: Implement the top navigation UI (Home/Gallery/Pricing/Contact) with theme-consistent hover/active styles and responsive small-screen behavior; include smooth-scroll behavior to section IDs. If using shadcn-ui components (e.g., navigation menu/button), verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire TopNav into the page and define section containers with stable IDs for smooth-scroll targets (Home, Gallery, Pricing, Contact).

requirements.summary: Add prompt input with mock Generate action that shows loading then appends a new placeholder image card from local assets.
acceptanceCriteria: Generate button does not call any external AI service.
Clicking Generate shows a visible loading state for ~0.5–1.5s and then updates the UI (e.g., adds a new gallery item).
If the prompt is empty, the UI prevents generation or displays a clear inline validation message.

file_operations.description: Create the prompt input section with a text input, inline validation, and a mock Generate button that shows a loading state (0.5–1.5s) and then adds a new item to the gallery using an existing local generated asset; no external API calls. If using shadcn-ui Input/Button, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a small hook/util to manage mock generation state (loading, validation, and producing a new gallery item referencing local assets) without any network calls.
Wire PromptGenerator into the layout and connect its output to the gallery state so a newly generated item appears in the Gallery grid.

requirements.summary: Implement Gallery section with title, optional client-side style/filter dropdown, and accessible image card grid with consistent aspect ratio and hover/focus states.
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays at least 6 static placeholder images in a grid similar to the design.
Cards are keyboard-focusable and have accessible alt text.
Dropdown (if included) updates gallery ordering or filtering on the client side without backend calls.

file_operations.description: Build the Gallery section with a title, a client-side style/filter dropdown (e.g., Dramatic), and a responsive grid of focusable image cards with consistent aspect ratio, rounded corners, and hover/focus styling; provide meaningful alt text and avoid backend calls. If using shadcn-ui Select/Card, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire GallerySection into the single-page layout, provide initial gallery items (at least 6) referencing the required local generated images, and pass any generated items appended by the mock generator.

requirements.summary: Ensure no real-person photos are used; replace with neutral non-person imagery while preserving layout composition.
acceptanceCriteria: No real-person photos from the uploaded image are reused in the site assets.
Hero and gallery imagery use neutral non-person visuals that preserve the intended composition.

file_operations.description: Ensure hero and gallery imagery references only the neutral non-person generated assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and does not reuse any real-person photos from grok_image_xg2a6g3.jpg.
Ensure gallery items and alt text describe neutral abstract/landscape AI-themed visuals (no references to real persons), and keep the intended card composition.

requirements.summary: Establish and apply the dark cinematic theme (charcoal surfaces, crimson accents, subtle glow, serif headline + sans body) consistently across the page.
acceptanceCriteria: Colors, gradients, and glow effects are consistent across nav/hero/prompt/gallery.
Headings use a consistent display type style; body text remains readable with sufficient contrast.
Buttons/inputs match the theme (rounded corners, subtle border/glow, consistent focus ring).

file_operations.description: Add global Tailwind base layers and theme tokens (CSS variables) to achieve dark charcoal surfaces, deep crimson accents, subtle glows, and consistent focus rings; ensure readable contrast and consistent typography across sections.

Extend Tailwind theme for the design language (e.g., font families for elegant serif headlines + sans body, and any additional utility defaults needed for glow/gradients) while keeping the existing CSS-variable color system.
Apply the finalized theme styling to navigation (dark surfaces, crimson highlight, subtle glow, consistent typography).
Apply the finalized theme styling to input/button (rounded corners, subtle border/glow, consistent focus ring and disabled/loading states).
Apply the finalized theme styling to gallery cards and dropdown (consistent borders, glow, hover/focus treatment).

requirements.summary: Add themed Pricing and Contact sections with English placeholder content and client-side contact form validation + local success message.
acceptanceCriteria: Pricing section contains at least 2–3 plan cards with names, prices, and bullet features (placeholder text is acceptable).
Contact section contains a styled contact form (name/email/message) that validates inputs client-side and shows a local success message on submit (no email integration).
Both sections are reachable via nav smooth-scroll and maintain consistent styling.

file_operations.description: Create a Pricing section with 2–3 themed plan cards (English content placeholders) consistent with the dark/crimson cinematic styling. If using shadcn-ui Card/Button, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a Contact section with a styled form (name/email/message), client-side validation, and a local success message on submit; no email integration or backend calls. If using shadcn-ui Input/Textarea/Button, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire PricingSection and ContactSection into the single-page layout with stable IDs matching the nav smooth-scroll targets and ensure consistent theme styling.

requirements.summary: Add required generated static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in hero and gallery.
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist at frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
Hero and gallery render these local assets directly (no backend image routing).
Site builds without broken image links.

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero background image asset (dark cinematic abstract background with subtle crimson glow haze) at the exact path frontend/public/assets/generated/bg-hero.dim_1600x2400.png.
Add the generated panel texture asset at the exact path frontend/public/assets/generated/panel-texture.dim_1600x900.png.
Add generated neutral non-person gallery image at frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-01.dim_900x1200.png.
Add generated neutral non-person gallery image at frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-02.dim_900x1200.png.
Add generated neutral non-person gallery image at frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-03.dim_900x1200.png.
Add generated neutral non-person gallery image at frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-04.dim_900x1200.png.
Add generated neutral non-person gallery image at frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-05.dim_900x1200.png.
Add generated neutral non-person gallery image at frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-06.dim_900x1200.png.

Reference the local generated assets (frontend/public/assets/generated/bg-hero.dim_1600x2400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/panel-texture.dim_1600x900.png, and gallery-01..06.dim_900x1200.png) in the hero and gallery UI to ensure no broken links and no backend image routing.
